Actions.Name: Get a User's Top Artists
Actions.Description: Get the current user's top artists based on calculated affinity.

Actions.Name: Get Current User's Profile
Actions.Description: Get detailed profile information about the current user (including the current user's username).

Actions.Name: Get User's Saved Albums
Actions.Description: Get a list of the albums saved in the current Spotify user's 'Your Music' library.

Actions.Name: Get All New Releases
Actions.Description: A list of new album releases featured in Spotify (Example: 'Browse' tab on the Spotify player).
